docs.lead_paragraph: A growing middle class and consumers' evolving attitudes toward health and travel have fueled a global spa and wellness industry worth an estimated $3.4 trillion in 2013, according to a report released on Tuesday.

headline.main: Global Spa, Wellness Industry Estimated at $3.4 Trillion: Report
headline.print_headline: Global Spa, Wellness Industry Estimated at $3.4 Trillion: Report

docs.snippet: A growing middle class and consumers' evolving attitudes toward health and travel have fueled a global spa and wellness industry worth an estimated $3.4 trillion in 2013, according to a report released on Tuesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. regulators on Tuesday charged two men with insider trading after they learned that hedge fund manager Bill Ackman was planning to announce a $1 billion (616.79 million pounds) bet against Herbalife Ltd based on a view the company was merely a "pyramid scheme."

headline.main: SEC Charges Two With Insider Trading on Ackman's Bet on Herbalife
headline.print_headline: SEC Charges Two With Insider Trading on Ackman's Bet on Herbalife

docs.lead_paragraph: Ina Garten is a best-selling cookbook author, an Emmy-winning television host and the doyenne of casual elegance. But on a recent afternoon, the so-called "Barefoot Contessa" star looked around her East Hampton, New York, kitchen and realized that she had produced piles of cherry biscotti and tubs of rum-raisin ice cream — but no dinner.

headline.main: Ina Garten Turns to Make-Ahead Meals in New Book
headline.print_headline: Ina Garten Turns to Make-Ahead Meals in New Book

docs.lead_paragraph: Education is supposed to help bridge the gap between the wealthiest people and everyone else. Ask the experts, and they'll count the ways:

headline.main: School Spending by Affluent Is Widening Wealth Gap
headline.print_headline: School Spending by Affluent Is Widening Wealth Gap

docs.snippet: Education is supposed to help bridge the gap between the wealthiest people and everyone else. Ask the experts, and they'll count the ways:

headline.main: Celiac Disease, a Common, but Elusive, Diagnosis

docs.abstract: A main reason for a lag in the detection of celiac disease is the long and confusing list of signs and symptoms, some of which may be mild enough to be easily ignored or attributed to another condition.
docs.snippet: A main reason for a lag in the detection of celiac disease is the long and confusing list of signs and symptoms, some of which may be mild enough to be easily ignored or attributed to another condition.

docs.lead_paragraph: An escalation of political turmoil in Yemen, one of the poorest countries in the world, risks aggravating an already dire food security situation, the United Nations Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) said on Monday.

headline.main: Political Conflicts Worsening Yemen Food Security: U.N. Agency
headline.print_headline: Political Conflicts Worsening Yemen Food Security: U.N. Agency

docs.lead_paragraph: The Cumberland Packing Corporation’s line of In the Raw products gets a family tree-themed marketing campaign.
